channel.title: CVE Feed for The Pallets Project -- Flask

item.title: CVE-2019-1010083|2024-08-05T03:07:18.278Z -- the%20pallets%20project -- flask
item.description: The Pallets Project Flask before 1.0 is affected by: unexpected memory usage. The impact is: denial of service. The attack vector is: crafted encoded JSON data. The fixed version is: 1. NOTE: this may overlap CVE-2018-1000656.
